metadata.Title: CVE-2018-2782 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
Vulnerability in the MySQL Server component of Oracle MySQL (subcomponent:InnoDB). Supported versions that are affected are 5.6.39 and prior and5.7.21 and prior. Easily exploitable vulnerability allows low privilegedattacker with network access via multiple protocols to compromise MySQLServer. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorizedability to cause a hang or frequently repeatable crash (complete DOS) ofMySQL Server. CVSS 3.0 Base Score 6.5 (Availability impacts). CVSS Vector:(CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:L/PR:L/UI:N/S:U/C:N/I:N/A:H).

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-2782` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmysqlclient20 - 5.7.22-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mysql-client - 5.7.22-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mysql-client-5.7 - 5.7.22-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mysql-client-core-5.7 - 5.7.22-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mysql-common - 5.7.22-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mysql-server - 5.7.22-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mysql-server-5.7 - 5.7.22-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mysql-server-core-5.7 - 5.7.22-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mysql-source-5.7 - 5.7.22-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mysql-testsuite - 5.7.22-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mysql-testsuite-5.7 - 5.7.22-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
No subscription required

libmariadbd18 - 10.0.36-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-client - 10.0.36-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-client-10.0 - 10.0.36-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-client-core-10.0 - 10.0.36-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-common - 10.0.36-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-plugin-connect - 10.0.36-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-plugin-mroonga - 10.0.36-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-plugin-oqgraph - 10.0.36-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-plugin-spider - 10.0.36-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-plugin-tokudb - 10.0.36-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-server - 10.0.36-0ubuntu0.16.04.1

Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: mysql-5.7 package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.7.22-0ubuntu0.16.04.1').
mariadb-10.0 package in esm-apps/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '10.0.36-0ubuntu0.16.04.1').
percona-xtradb-cluster-5.6 package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and needs fixing.
percona-server-5.6 package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and needs fixing.
